name: Custom Keycap
description: A fully customized, 3D printed keycap for mechanical keyboards. Made with durable resin and available in multiple colors. Perfect for personalizing your setup.

name: Mechanical Part
description: A precision-engineered mechanical part designed via CAD for industrial applications. Built for high performance and durability. Contact for material specifications.

name: Bolt Action
description: A fun, artistic bolt-action mechanism model. Great for hobbyists and as a unique desktop toy. Non-functional, for display only.

name: Architectural Model
description: A detailed scale model of an architectural design, perfect for presentations and client showcases. Created using high-detail 3D printing and finishing techniques.

name: Lego Design
description: A custom design service for unique Lego creations. From complex models to personalized figures, our designers can build anything you can imagine.

name: Phone Stand
description: A sleek and modern 3D printed phone stand. Holds your phone vertically or horizontally. Available in a variety of colors to match your desk setup.

name: Engineering Consult
description: A one-hour consultation with one of our experienced design engineers to discuss your project, review schematics, and plan your next steps.

name: Custom Coaster Set
description: A set of four custom-designed and 3D printed coasters. Add your own logo, text, or pattern. A perfect personalized gift or addition to your home.

name: Drone Chassis
description: A lightweight and durable drone chassis, designed for FPV racing. Optimized for strength and aerodynamics. Carbon fiber material.

name: Miniature Figurine
description: A custom tabletop gaming miniature. Provide your character description and we will design and print a high-detail figure for your campaign.

name: Product Prototyping
description: Full product prototyping service. From initial concept sketch to a functional, 3D printed prototype. Includes two design revision rounds.

name: Desk Organizer
description: A modular desk organizer system. Includes a pen holder, phone stand, and tray. Customize the layout to fit your needs.

name: Custom Jewelry
description: Design a unique piece of jewelry. Work with our artists to create a custom pendant, ring, or earrings, brought to life with 3D printing.

name: RC Car Parts
description: Durable, custom-designed parts for your RC car. Bumpers, suspension arms, and more. Stronger than stock parts.

name: 3D Scan Service
description: High-resolution 3D scanning service. We can scan your object and provide a detailed 3D model for replication or modification.

name: Cookie Cutter Set
description: A set of 5 custom-themed cookie cutters. Perfect for parties and baking with family. Food-safe PLA plastic.
